thread.section_title: Lovehoney Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.lovehoney.co.uk
thread.title: Lee

author: Lee
title: Lee
text: We regularly purchase from Lovehoney and they always deliver great quality products. Recently we received a free gift that was unfortunately faulty so as it was free we decided to just email customer services to inform them just for their own reference and not to return it. Their response was to immediately send out a replacement product a very unexpected outcome to our email. Great customer service! Great company!
